game.name: Subway Surfers
game.description:
Another one of the highly addictive and engaging adventure game is ready to hit your screen! Trying it not will definitely give you something big to lose! If you cannot believe our words, give EG Subway Surfers a try and get ready to enter an environment that includes nothing, but a great proportion of fun and thrill. Based on theme of popular running games named “Subway Surfers”, this endless run game has everything that you need to have fun when you are bored. 

The objective in this cute subway themed adventure game will remain the same. You have to help the boy who wants to run on a track that is full of obstacles. It will be your duty to help him by sliding the screen to surf in subway while escaping from the dangerous inspectors. We are damn sure that when you join this crazy running game, you will forget the fun you had during the gameplay of Subway Surfers. Be prepared to surf the road, jump from one train to another, and make sure not to get caught by the cops on road! 

Try to reach as long as you can to create the highest score in this free online PC version Subway Surfers game! There are lots of things to do when you join it. You as a player have to avoid barriers, obstacles, subway cops, taxis and buses. We are pretty confident on your skills. So cover the maximum possible distance on the track and prove the world that you are a wonderful running champion. Good luck to create the best score in this one of the best subway runner games for kids!!
